scripts.postinstall: if [ ${DEV:-0} = 1 ]; then rm -rf node_modules/listrp node_modules/iterrep && ln -s ../../../pkgs/listrp node_modules/listrp && ln -s ../../../src node_modules/iterrep; fi
scripts.watch: npx mkdirp dist && npx watchify src/index.js -t babelify --outfile dist/index.js -dv
scripts.prestart: test -e src/settings.json || echo {} > src/settings.json; test -e paramsTemplates.json || ln -s node_modules/iterrep/testdata/paramsTemplates.json paramsTemplates.json; test -e src/parameters.json || cat paramsTemplates.json | json default > src/parameters.json
scripts.watch:tester: npx mkdirp dist && npx watchify src/tester.js -t babelify --outfile dist/tester.js -dv
scripts.userstudy:neck: cat paramsTemplates.json | json unresponsive > src/parameters.json && cat settingTemplates.json | json neck > src/settings.json && npm start
scripts.userstudy:turn: cat paramsTemplates.json | json unresponsive > src/parameters.json && cat settingTemplates.json | json turn > src/settings.json && npm start
scripts.demo:neck: cat paramsTemplates.json | json demo > src/parameters.json && cat settingTemplates.json | json demo_neck > src/settings.json &&  npm start
scripts.demo:turn: cat paramsTemplates.json | json demo > src/parameters.json && cat settingTemplates.json | json demo_turn > src/settings.json &&  npm start
